summary: This code sets up a man-in-the-middle (MITM) proxy using MitmProxy, listening on port 8050 and logging all captured traffic to 'qq.log'. It also enables WebSocket stream processing for the 'tv.danmaku.bili' application.

details.comment: This code sets up a man-in-the-middle (MITM) proxy using MitmProxy, listening on port 8050 and logging all captured traffic to 'qq.log'. It also enables WebSocket stream processing for the 'tv.danmaku.bili' application.
